Please select project in the top right corner 
 and then select your scene ID

agree-term-error: You must agree to the terms before you can sign up

telemarketing-business-license-number: Telemarketing business license number No.2020-Jeonnam Suncheon-2995-Republic-of-Korea

total-room-count-exceed: You can create up to 3 rooms for this project
room-user-limit: Not available on free products, please contact help@belivvr.com
permission-not-ready: Permission settings will be supported soon.
delete-project-modal: Are you sure you want to delete the project?
landing-title: Welcome to the XRCLOUD Developers page.
landing-description:
The XRCLOUD Developer Center is a place to create, share, and experience VR/AR spaces. 
 Create, share, and experience various spaces. 

 For more information, check out the address below.

withdraw-contents:
If you withdraw your membership, all Project, Scene, and Room information you have will be lost, 
 and you will not be able to recover the data.
withdraw-contents2: Are you sure you want to withdraw your membership?
